snippet.title: Critter Cafe Is Coming to PC & Switch 26th November 2024
snippet.description:
Creature raising, café management game Critter Café will be opening its doors from 26 November 2024 on PC and Nintendo Switch™. 

35 Critters are waiting to be saved from mysterious portals, each with a new puzzle to challenge your wits. Once saved, Critters can be invited into your café, free to roam as you pour coffee and deliver cakes to customers or serving as the star attraction for special bookings.

A demo will be available as part of Steam Next Fest on 14-21 October, giving players a trial run at managing their café and saving some Critters. Mogbert is waiting for you! 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2367610/Critter_Cafe/

▪ Secret Mode Twitter ▶ https://bit.ly/SMTwitterLink
▪ Secret Mode Twitch ▶ https://bit.ly/SMTwitchLink
▪ Secret Mode Facebook ▶ https://bit.ly/SMFacebookLink
▪ Secret Mode Instagram ▶ https://bit.ly/SMInstaLink
▪ Secret Mode Website ▶ https://bit.ly/SMWebsiteLink

#convergence #CritterCafe #gametrailers #pcgaming #nintendoswitch
